crunch.description: Game master's inner monologue, technical adjudications, and mechanics involved in resolving player actions. Include dice roll results and rule interpretations.

fluff.description: This section describes the world and all actions within to the player. The content is structured into two arrays: speakers and dialogue. IMPORTANT: The Narrator (index 0) must only be used for narration and direct interraction with the player, never for speaker speech. The player character must have their own named speaker entry and only use it for direct or reported speech. All other speaking characters should be listed

index.description: Index for the speaker. 0 is reserved for the Narrator, 1 for the player character, 2+ for other characters.

name.description: Name of the speaker. Must be 'Narrator' for index 0, character's name for the others.

gender.description: Gender of the speaker. Must be 'NonBinary' for the Narrator.

speaker_index.description: Index of the speaker in the 'speakers' array. 0 for Narrator, 1 for player character, 2+ for other characters.

text.description: Must contain at least one line. For Game master narration: Narrator's text, including interracting with the player, dialogue tags, action breaks, and general narration but never direct speaker speech. For speech: Direct dialogue of a character but only direct speech.
